document.full_text: the tennessee house of representatives voted on thursday to strip teachers unions of most of their collective bargaining powers, setting up a showdown with the state senate, which already voted to end all union bargaining.
document.title: tennessee house passes bill to curb teachers' unions
lines_and_colors: the tennessee house of representatives voted on thursday to strip teachers unions of most of their collective bargaining powers, setting up a showdown with the state senate, which already voted to end all union bargaining.
